name: Excerpt from "Solo nos vimos..." (We just saw each other...)By Simon J. Correa T.
description:
The shrieks of your footsteps
run to the loneliness.
The impetus of your lips
manipulating a deep spell.
The vehemence of your gaze
conspiring with memories.
I have remained engrossed,
silently in love.

Time was enough
for you to talk to me about life,
of the small falls,
of lost dreams,
of the impatient destiny,
of empty loves;
the time was enough
to love you again.

The vague hope
reflected in your smile,
persuading the innocence
of my thoughts.
Confused are the intentions
to make sense of this brief
coincidence.
After all, we are
we are only a vicissitude
of a misunderstood past,
an epic extinguished
in this vast delirium.

And that, that we only saw each other!
